DOC.brief_title: Comparison Psychological Pharmacological Treatments Pain Due Temporomandibular Joint Disorder ( TMD )
DOC.detailed_description: This randomize , control trial evaluate pharmacological ( nortriptyline vs. active placebo - benztropine ) psychological ( cognitive-behavioral therapy vs. disease education ) treatment pain disability due temporomandibular joint disorder ( TMD ) . Patients 18 65 year old meeting RDC criterion TMD eligibility criterion complete 3-week baseline monitoring phase prior randomization . Active treatment consist weekly visit 8 week , maintenance treatment 6 month . Outcome measure include pain , physical psychosocial function assess post-treatment , 3-months , 6-months
